ygData.subject: Re: Sitting made productive.
ygData.msgSnippet: I use my sense direction skill while I heal..hehe ... From: AzerothJS@aol.com  To: warriors_eq@onelist.com  Date:
ygData.messageBody:
I use my sense direction skill while I heal..hehe
-----Original Message-----
From: AzerothJS@... <AzerothJS@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 27, 1999 10:29 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Sitting made productive.


>From: AzerothJS@...
>
>I don't know if you all do something like this already or not, but I'll
give
>it a shot. What I, in my callow youth, have discovered, is that when I am
>without a healer and I take a fletching kit and arrow components along to
>make arrows while I sit to heal, I don't mind the waiting as much. You may
>be wealthy enough to afford arrows from the store, but I prefer the
lovingly
>handcrafted and economical arrows of my own making. Just thought you might
>be interested in my solitary original tidbit.
>
>Rocjaw,
>Son of Halas
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join a new list today!
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
>
